file_content.text: Heya, Captain. Bet you're surprised to see me.
How the blazes did you get here?
Skavak?
I hitched a ride on the only ship that could make this trip--yours.
I'm only surprised you have the guts to face me in person.
It seemed inevitable.
Let's say you've earned my personal attention.
And happy I get to kill you.
For a worthless piece of scum, you sure are an optimist. Me, I'm more practical.
See, I've always believed if you can't beat 'em, join 'em... and then beat 'em. So I stowed away back on Nar Shaddaa.
Funny thing about Wookiees--they've got great big lungs. Only takes a couple of breaths of happy gas to knock one out.
I don't need Bowdaar to kill you.
That doesn't mean you win.
Skavak, I want my BlasTech ALT-25 back. I want my Torchy.
You have a real single-minded devotion to your toys, kid. It's gonna get you killed.
All I had to do was wait for you to leave, then give that idiot Corso another smack in the back of the head.
That farm boy is so fired when we get back.
He failed me again.
Give me the honor of killing this scum.
By all means, send your Wookiee at me. I need a new winter coat.
Note to self: Invest in some better locks.
I need better security.
Oh, you won't be needing those anymore.
What do you say we split the treasure?
So... partners?
Generous, but I'm not good at sharing.
I want to be civil about this. Sure, you've made my life miserable--but I don't hold a grudge. Really.
You should've quit while you were behind, Skavak.
Give it up, already.
And miss all this fun? Not a chance.
I clearly haven't hurt you enough.
Then I should do more damage.
Don't kid yourself. You haven't hurt me at all.
Bottom line: There's nothing you have that I can't steal.
They say the best things in life are free--and I'm the best.
[Flirt] Try stealing a kiss.
Don't be a tease, Captain. My heart is fragile.
We're so much alike. We don't have to be enemies, do we?
Take a chance.
Can't say I never thought about you and me together....
Are you people out of your minds?
Go stand in a corner, kid. Your captain and I need a moment.
I've done crazier things, but never with someone so gorgeous.
Mmmm... that was definitely worth the risk.
You were fun, but I have a fortune to claim.
Yes--but the treasure is mine.
You're so cute when you're deluded. I'm gonna miss you.
After all this buildup, I was expecting you to be... more.
I've had better.
Oh, yeah? Well... so did... me too!
Idiot. [Punch him in the gut.]
You lying little--I'll kill you!
I guess you're not man enough for me.
Coward.
If you really want a kiss, I've got one for you right here. Pucker up....
Die, you pig-lizard.
What heart? [Attack]
I'll always be more handsome than you, Skavak.
What about my good looks?
The ladies already love me. Why tamper with perfection?
Don't push your luck.
Then you should stop holding back.
Enough witty banter. Time for you to die....
I've got bad news for you--dead men can't steal.
You're mistaken. [Attack]
I've been wanting to kill you since Ord Mantell.
But I am. [Attack]
